casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Young, Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio, Appellee.

[Cite as State ex rel. Young v. Indus. Comm. (1998), 82 Ohio St.3d 382.]

*383(No. 96-427 Submitted June 9, 1998 Decided July 22, 1998.) Hochman & Roach Co., L.P.A., Gary D. Plunkett and Kalla A. Cox, for appellant. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and William D. Haders, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
